lines.speaker: Winston
lines.zh: 小A啊，我看你今天，喝了快十几杯咖啡了，是不是最近工作量太大了啊。要是忙不过来的话，一定和我说啊。
lines.en: Xiao A, I noticed you’ve had like ten cups of coffee today. Is your workload getting too heavy? If it’s too much, make sure to let me know.

lines.speaker: 我
lines.zh: 没事，没事，我就是昨晚没睡好，最近确实有点失眠，但是应该很快就好了。<3
lines.en: No worries, really. I just didn’t sleep well last night. I’ve been having some insomnia lately, but it should get better soon. <3

lines.speaker: Winston
lines.zh: 失眠也不是小事啊，这样吧，下周那个报表你就别管了，我来想办法。可不能让你把公司的咖啡都喝光了啊:D
lines.en: Insomnia’s no small thing. Tell you what—don’t worry about that report next week, I’ll handle it. We can’t let you drink up the whole company’s coffee supply! :D
